description: A combination of items made by reordering
The state or fact of being an individual or having human characteristics and feelings
A special jacket used to tie the arms of a violent person tightly around their body
The state or quality of being outrageous or ugly
To weaken or become weak; reduce in size, strength, density, or value
Relating to marriage or a married couple's relationship
To bring or be brought to a further stage of development; improve
To happen at the same time or to be similar, and often to seem to be connected
